sourcesContent:
import "./Form.css"
import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col';
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form';
import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row';

import RangeSlider from 'react-bootstrap-range-slider';
import React, { useState } from 'react';


function GridBasicExample() {

    const [ sliderValue, setSliderValue ] = React.useState(25);


  return (
    <Form
        id="MainForm"
    >
      <Row>
        <Col>
        <Form.Group>
            <Form.Label>
                Select # of samples to use
            </Form.Label>
            <RangeSlider
            value={value}
            onChange={e => setValue(e.target.value)}
            />
        </Form.Group>
        </Col>
        <Col xs="3">
          <Form.Control value={value}/>
        </Col>
      </Row>
      <Row>
        <Col>
            <Form.Text>
                Select which tasks to train/test on
            </Form.Text>
        </Col>
      </Row>
      <Row>
        <Col>
            <Form.Check 
                type="switch"
                id="task1-switch"
                label="Task1"
            />
        </Col>
        <Col>
            <Form.Check 
                type="switch"
                id="task2-switch"
                label="Task2"
            />
        </Col>
        <Col>
            <Form.Check 
                type="switch"
                id="task3-switch"
                label="Task3"
            />
        </Col>
      </Row>
    </Form>
  );
}

export default GridBasicExample;
